name: Black and Red Beaded Necklace
description:
Let this lovely black and red rose necklace incite you to make a dramatic statement when you wear this timeless and never out of vogue necklace.

It is an off loom bead woven necklace. The pendant is a tiny purse.

It measures about 4 1/2 long, that includes the fringe by 2 wide.

The necklace measures 27 1/2 inches long. I have used a button and loop closure.

I also have gift shipping options with no extra charge.
Your purchase can be shipped directly to your recipient, it will be wrapped with gift wrapping, and I am also happy to include a handwritten message from you on an enclosure card.

name: Seafoam Green and Black Beaded Necklace
description:
This beaded necklace is made with very small glass seed beads. It is a spiral style bead woven necklace with beautiful sea foam green beads wrapping around a black core. I added a bead and loop clasp.

It measures 42 inches long by 1/4 inch wide.

It can be worn doubled or just tie a knot or do a half twist turn.

I also have gift shipping options with no extra charge.
Your purchase can be shipped directly to your recipient, it will be wrapped with gift wrapping, and I am also happy to include a handwritten message from you on an enclosure card.

name: Long Opera Length Spider Agate Gemstone Necklace
description:
These spider agate gemstones are quite unique. They have a natural spider web design and each bead is different. Some have a crackle in them that causes a golden amber glow when the light hits them. I accented them with faceted black onyx gemstones, sand satin button pearls and glass seed beads. It has a lead free pewter antique silver toggle clasp.

Opera Length
35 inchs long
Spider agate is about 1/2 inches wide

I use the best beading materials and I know that you will be very pleased with my work.

I also have gift shipping options with no extra charge.
Your purchase can be shipped directly to your recipient, it will be wrapped with gift wrapping, and I am also happy to include a handwritten message from you on an enclosure card.

name: Blue and Amber Beaded Necklace
description: I made this bead-woven style necklace with very tiny glass seed beads. It has a handmade beaded bead for the clasp. It measures about 18 inches long the beadwork measures 1 inch at the back to 2 inches long at the center. The copperlined blue transparent  seed beads really make this necklace beautiful.

name: Chainmaille and Lampwork Bead Necklace
description:
This necklace measures about 16 inches long and the chain 1/4 inch wide.  

The center link is one of my lamp work beads with argentium sterling silver,sterling silver beads.  

I made the chain from argentium sterling silver wire. The pattern is 1/2 byzantine. I also handmade the spiral hook clasp.

    I use the best beading materials and I know that you will be very pleased with my work. 

 I also have gift shipping options with no extra charge.
Your purchase can be shipped directly to your recipient, it will be wrapped with gift wrapping, and I am also happy to include a handwritten message from you on an enclosure card.
